name: A grey blindfold
data: It decreases the users dexterity impressively.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'harm body'.
